radiographic_examinations.findings: Impacted fracture of the left humerus and evidence of osteopenia.
T scores of −4.4 in the spine, −2.7 in the hip, and −3.1 in the neck of the femur, indicating osteoporosis.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: No significant change in the spine, femoral neck, or total hip but showed a 4.3% improvement in the trochanter.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple compression fractures of the thoracic spine without any lytic lesions.
